mapper.select: SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_real_name, it.item_title, s.shop_name, it.item_price, it.item_region , it.item_date FROM item it, recentView re, img im, shop s WHERE re.member_id = AND it.item_idx IN (re.item_idx) AND it.item_idx = im.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1' AND s.shop_idx = it.shop_idx ORDER BY re.viewTime DESC
